type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.repositories.ArtifactRepository
type.description: * A repository for resolving and publishing artifacts.

method.name: getName
method.description:
* Returns the name for this repository. A name must be unique amongst a repository set. A default name is provided for the repository if none * is provided. * *

The name is used in logging output and error reporting to point to information related to this repository. * * @return The name.

method.name: setName
method.description: * Sets the name for this repository. * * If this repository is to be added to an {@link org.gradle.api.artifacts.ArtifactRepositoryContainer} * (including {@link org.gradle.api.artifacts.dsl.RepositoryHandler}), its name cannot be changed after it has * been added to the container. * * @param name The name. Must not be null. * @throws IllegalStateException If the name is set after it has been added to the container.

property.name: name
property.description:
* Returns the name for this repository. A name must be unique amongst a repository set. A default name is provided for the repository if none * is provided. * *

The name is used in logging output and error reporting to point to information related to this repository. * * @return The name.
